title: New Yesterday
description: Find your past.Save your future.What if you could change everything in your life you wish you'd done differently? Fix regret? Unlock the potential of your past?That's what Adam Swann did in New Yesterday, a city where events in the present can alter history. He's living the life of his dreams, yet he can't shake a name from his mind -- the memory of a woman from a past he left behind.Who is she? And despite the dangers that remembering his former life would pose, why can't he bring himself to forget her?Adam will unearth long-buried secrets as he searches the city for clues to the woman woven through his memory, haunting his every thought. As the truth of his past drags him into a conspiracy that threatens everything he knows, he'll be forced to choose between the life of his dreams or facing the man he used to be.
author: Frasier Armitage
